mapper.select: select no, title, writer, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from anonymous order by no desc
select no, title, content, writer, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from anonymous where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into anonymous(no, title, content, writer) values(anonymous_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update anonymous set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where no=#{no}
update anonymous set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
